repositories.new_features_summary: Driver split into subcommands, page hierarchy refactoring, implicit tag ending, and markdown support.
repositories.new_features:
- **Driver command restructuring** split `odoc_driver` into three distinct subcommands: `dune`, `opam`, and `voodoo` modes for better organization and clearer usage patterns ([#1237](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1237))
- **New page hierarchy system** with tree-based representation replacing linear sidebar structure, improving navigation and supporting complex documentation hierarchies ([#1232](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1232), [#1236](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1236))

- **Relaxed hierarchy constraints** allowing overlapping `-L` and `-P` roots while maintaining disjoint constraints within each type, enabling more flexible documentation organization ([#1233](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1233))
- **Standalone markdown support** through new `odoc-md` package based on cmarkit, enabling processing of markdown files into page-*.odoc files for HTML/man output ([#1234](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1234))
- **Voodoo integration improvements** with layout changes and compile/link phase separation to support links between non-dependent packages ([#1241](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1241))
- **Directory structure standardization** with consistent naming conventions: `odoc_dir` for .odoc files and `odocl_dir` for .odocl files across all modules ([#1235](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1235))
